remarks: The subspace sum of two singleton spans is closed.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dihsmsnrn.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihsmsnrn.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihsmsnrn.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dihsmsnrn.p $e |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` U ) $.
dihsmsnrn.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` U ) $.
dihsmsnrn.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihsmsnrn.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihsmsnrn.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
dihsmsnrn.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
dihsmsnrn $p |- ( ph -> ( ( N ` { X } ) .(+) ( N ` { Y } ) ) e. ran I ) $.
